text: Ara tara ceye adhika yalema ara ke hate pare, yake tara rabera ayatasamuha smarana kariye deya hayeche, atahpara se ta theke bimukha hayeche [1] ebam se bhule geche ya tara du-hata pesa kareche? Niscaya amara tadera antarera upara abarana diyechi yena tara kura'ana bujhate na pare ebam tadera kane badhirata emte diyechi [2]. Ara apani taderake satpathe dakale'o tara kakhano satpathe asabe na
